item.title: 煤炭暴利暴露中国钢铁之痛
item.description:
北京对廉价蒙古供应品的抢购说明了该行业面临的压力。【原文：

Beijing’s rush for cheap Mongolian supplies speaks to an industry under pressure.

】

item.title: 苏格兰法院同意审理罗斯班克油田气候案
item.description: 爱丁堡最高民事法庭已同意听取气候运动人士以气候为由要求阻止北海罗斯班克（Rosebank）油气开发项目的辩论。【原文：The Court of Session in Edinburgh has agreed to hear arguments brought by climate campaigners seeking to block the Rosebank oil and gas development in the North Sea on climate grounds.】

item.title: 私募股权基金请来专家修复卖不掉的公司
item.description: 重量级收购公司越来越多地采用老式的赚钱方式，即实际经营他们收购的公司。【原文：Buyout heavyweights are increasingly resorting to the old-fashioned way of making money — actually running the companies they’ve bought.】

item.title: 经合组织称德国必须 "回归改革 "以提振经济
item.description: 经合组织（OECD）首席经济学家阿尔瓦罗-桑托斯-佩雷拉（Alvaro Santos Pereira）认为，德国需要进行改革，以改善竞争和减少官僚主义，从而帮助启动欧洲最大的经济体。【原文：Germany needs to carry out reforms to improve competition and cut bureaucracy in order to help kickstart Europe’s biggest economy, according to OECD Chief Economist Alvaro Santos Pereira.】

item.title: 美光公司业绩或显示人工智能赢家正在折价交易
item.description: 美光科技公司可能会成为最新一家向投资者保证人工智能相关设备需求依然强劲的芯片制造商。与许多同行一样，美光也可能承认，个人电脑和智能手机等其他主要领域的需求依然低迷。【原文：Micron Technology Inc. will probably become the latest chipmaker to assure investors that demand for AI-related gear is still strong. Like many peers, it may also admit that other staple areas of demand such as PCs and smartphones remain in the doldrums.】

item.title: Meta 推出 VR 十年后仍在为 Quest 寻求受众
item.description: 十年过去了，Meta 公司仍在试图让我们相信虚拟现实是未来的趋势。但首先...【原文：Ten years in, Meta is still trying to convince us that virtual reality is the future. But first...】

item.title: 两年前，这款相机风靡全球。你仍然买不到
item.description:
TikTok 对富士 X100V 的喜爱为这家日本公司带来了丰厚的利润，而这家公司最初在数字时代的竞争中举步维艰。【原文：

TikTok’s love of the Fujifilm X100V has driven big profits for the Japanese company, which initially struggled to compete in the digital era.

】

item.title: 美国抵押贷款利率再次下降，引发再融资大潮
item.description: 随着越来越多的美国人利用两年来最低廉的借贷成本，抵押贷款再融资申请连续第二周激增。【原文：Applications to refinance mortgages surged for a second week as more Americans capitalized on the cheapest borrowing costs in two years.】

item.title: 邦吉拯救巨型大豆供应商之举取决于阿根廷法院
item.description: 阿根廷最高法院将决定是否允许农作物巨头邦吉全球公司（Bunge Global SA）和维特拉公司（Viterra Inc.【原文：A top court in Argentina is set to decide whether crop giants Bunge Global SA and Viterra Inc. will be allowed to take over a company that was once the crown jewel of the country’s massive soybean-processing industry.】

item.title: 中国为欧洲疲软的大宗商品股提供脆弱的生命线
item.description: 人们已经开始担心，本周受中国刺激措施刺激的欧洲商品股涨势可能不会持久。【原文：There are already concerns that this week’s rally in European commodity stocks, spurred by Chinese stimulus measures, may not last.】

item.title: 越南总理瞄准外国直接投资，资助人工智能和大数据发展
item.description: 越南总理范明正誓言要通过降低物流成本和改善基础设施，吸引 "至关重要的 "外国投资进入人工智能开发领域，因为越南正努力将自己打造成全球先进技术中心。【原文：Vietnam’s Prime Minister Pham Minh Chinh vowed to lure “crucial” foreign investment into AI development by cutting logistics costs and improving infrastructure, as the country seeks to establish itself as a global hub for advanced technology.】

item.title: EQT 考虑出售助听器公司 WS Audiology 的股份
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，收购公司 EQT AB 正在考虑出售其在 WS Audiology A/S 公司的一小部分股权，这笔交易可能会使全球最大的助听器制造商之一的估值达到约 70 亿欧元（78 亿美元）或更高。【原文：Buyout firm EQT AB is considering selling a small part of its ownership in WS Audiology A/S, in a deal that could value one of the world’s largest hearing aid makers at about €7 billion ($7.8 billion) or more, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 中国宣布向贫困人口发放现金，这是罕见的援助举措
item.description: 中国表示，将在本周二之前向极端贫困人口发放一次性现金，这是在公布刺激世界第二大经济体的全面计划仅一天后，中国罕见地宣布的一项直接援助。【原文：China said it will give one-off cash handouts to people in extreme poverty before Tuesday, in a rare announcement of direct aid just a day after unveiling a sweeping program to stimulate the world’s second-largest economy.】

item.title: 法国国家巴黎银行称法国电力定价过低，需求将有所恢复
item.description: 据法国巴黎银行（BNP Paribas SA）称，由于市场尚未对未来更高的需求和更强劲的出口进行定价，法国明年的电力交易价格低于其实际价值。【原文：French electricity for next year is trading below its real value as the market hasn’t yet priced in higher future demand and stronger exports, according to BNP Paribas SA.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。在 S&P 500 指数创下今年第 41 个新高之后，美国股市似乎将出现下滑，亚洲股市则受到中国股市的提振，而黄金则再创历史新高。以下是交易员们正在谈论的话题。【原文：Good morning. US Stocks look set to slip after the S&P 500 posted its 41st record of the year, Asian shares get a boost from China and Gold hits another all-time peak. Here’s what traders are talking about. — David Goodman】

item.title: 印度顶级证券交易所价值翻番，首次公开募股有望成功
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士称，印度国家证券交易所有限公司在私募市场上的估值在过去四个月里翻了一番，达到 360 亿美元，这是因为投资者预计该公司最早可能在明年第一季度进行首次公开募股。【原文：National Stock Exchange of India Ltd.’s valuation in the private markets has doubled to $36 billion in the last four months, backed by investor expectation that an initial public offering could materialize as early as the first quarter of next year, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 欣喜情绪褪去后，中国干预股市的道路依然漫长
item.description: 中国承诺提供高达 3,400 亿美元的资金来提振陷入困境的股市，这与国内和日本过去的努力不谋而合。【原文：China’s pledge of up to $340 billion to boost its ailing equities is invoking parallels with past efforts at home and in Japan that largely faltered in lifting the economy after an initial burst of enthusiasm.】

item.title: 动视和暴雪的企业魔兽内幕
item.description:
鲍比-科蒂克（Bobby Kotick）和迈克-莫海姆（Mike Morhaime）曾是视频游戏行业不可阻挡的一对，直到他们互相争斗。新书Play Nice节选。【原文：

Bobby Kotick and Mike Morhaime were the video game industry’s unstoppable pair, until they fought each other. An excerpt from the new book Play Nice.

】

item.title: 优步与中国 WeRide 合作在阿联酋提供机器人出租车服务
item.description: 优步（Uber Technologies Inc. ）正与中国自动驾驶汽车公司WeRide Inc.合作，将其机器人出租车服务扩展到阿拉伯联合酋长国。【原文：Uber Technologies Inc. is partnering with Chinese autonomous car company WeRide Inc. to expand its robotaxi offering to the United Arab Emirates.】

item.title: Horizon Capital 据称将重启出售 IT 服务公司 Sabio 的交易
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Horizon Capital 已重启出售技术服务公司 Sabio Group 的计划。【原文：Horizon Capital has revived plans to sell technology services firm Sabio Group, according to people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 据《日经新闻》报道，铃木将在印度扩建门店，丰田将在印度建厂
item.description: 据《日经新闻》周三报道，日本汽车制造商铃木计划到 2030 财年将其在印度的汽车经销商数量增加 70%，达到约 6800 家。【原文：Japanese automaker Suzuki plans to increase the number of car dealerships it has in India by 70% to around 6,800 by fiscal 2030, Nikkei reported Wednesday.】

item.title: 分析师热捧法航荷航股票，法航荷航前景光明
item.description: 据分析师称，法航荷航明年的前景一片光明，在经历了艰难的一年后，他们开始对该公司股票产生好感。【原文：Air France-KLM’s outlook for next year is brightening, according to analysts, who are starting to warm to the stock after a tough year.】

item.title: 游说团体称欧洲汽车业面临完美风暴
item.description: 欧洲汽车游说团体负责人表示，在欧盟出台更严格的减少碳排放新法规之前，欧洲汽车制造商正面临着日益严峻的挑战，因为电动汽车的需求令人失望，成本也在上升。【原文：Europe’s automakers are facing deepening challenges as demand for EVs disappoints and costs rise, ahead of tougher new European Union regulation to reduce carbon emissions, according to the head of the region’s car lobby group.】

item.title: 贝莱德看好亚洲基础设施的增长，以支持人工智能的蓬勃发展
item.description: 贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc. ）认为，亚洲的基础设施建设将迎来巨大的发展机遇，以支持人工智能的蓬勃发展，同时刺激能源和水资源的需求。【原文：BlackRock Inc. sees huge growth opportunities in Asia for infrastructure to support a boom in artificial intelligence that’s also spurring energy and water demand.】

item.title: 中国提振新兴市场股市，创七月以来最长连胜纪录
item.description: 新兴市场股市连续第五天上涨，原因是中国最新一轮的刺激政策继续刺激全球对高风险资产的偏好。【原文：Emerging-market stocks rise for a fifth straight day as China’s latest round of stimulus continues to fuel appetite for riskier assets globally.】

item.title: 美元接近抹去今年所有涨幅
item.description: 美元即将抹去今年以来的所有涨幅，因为市场押注美联储将以快于此前预期的速度削减利率，以支持经济。【原文：The US dollar is on the verge of erasing all of its gains this year on bets the Federal Reserve will slash rates at a faster pace than previously expected to support the economy.】

item.title: 德国希望德国商业银行具有 "最大可能的独立性
item.description: 德国政府重申反对意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit SpA）收购德国商业银行股份公司（Commerzbank AG），并表示希望这家德国第二大银行 "尽可能独立"。【原文：The German government reiterated its opposition to a takeover of Commerzbank AG by Italy’s UniCredit SpA, saying it wants the “greatest possible independence” for the country’s second-biggest lender.】

item.title: 马来西亚中央银行认为林吉特将获得 "持久支持
item.description: 马来西亚央行表示，鉴于该国良好的经济前景和结构性改革，林吉特的强势将持续下去。【原文：Malaysia’s central bank said the ringgit’s strength is set to last given the nation’s favorable economic outlook and structural reforms.】

item.title: 经合组织将英国经济增长上调至七国集团最高水平，但对通货膨胀提出警告
item.description: 经合组织（OECD）上调了英国未来两年的经济增长预测，上调幅度超过了七国集团中的任何其他国家，尽管人们对英国潜在的通胀压力仍有担忧。【原文：The OECD upgraded UK growth forecasts for the next two years by more than any other Group of Seven nation, despite lingering concerns about underlying inflation pressures in Britain.】

item.title: 全球经济摆脱通胀危机，实现稳定增长
item.description: 据经合组织（OECD）称，随着强劲通胀压力的缓解，各国央行得以继续谨慎地放松政策，全球经济正在步入新的稳定期。【原文：The global economy is settling into a newfound stability as the stress of strong inflation eases, allowing central banks to keep cautiously loosening policy, according to the OECD.】
